creator: bpcrochet@yahoo.com
text:
The following list of files contain an external image reference to 
jakarta.apache.org. Perhaps these should contain a local reference to the 
image. The image I speak of is the apache logo at the top of each of these 
pages. This was built from source.

antnews.html
external.html
faq.html
index.html
logos.html
problems.html
resources.html

creator: conor@apache.org
text: What is the problem with the external link.

creator: bpcrochet@yahoo.com
text:
Suppose you are looking at the documentation on a laptop with no network
connection? With the external link, it will either look ugly, or lock up the
browser until it times out. Most downloadable documentation is self-contained.

A copy of the Jakarta logo has been added to Ant's directory structure and the 
links have been adjusted to be relative.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
